SELECT DISTINCT B.BNO, B.TITLE, B.CONTENT, M1.ID, M1.NAME, B.CREATE_DATE, B.ORIGINAL_FILENAME, B.READCOUNT, B.STATUS FROM COMMBOARD B LEFT OUTER JOIN MEMBER M1 ON B.MNO = M1.MNO LEFT OUTER JOIN COMMREPLY R ON R.BNO = B.BNO LEFT OUTER JOIN MEMBER M2 ON R.MNO = M2.MNO WHERE B.STATUS = 'Y' AND B.TYPE = 'HONEY'
AND M1.NAME LIKE '%${name}%'
AND B.TITLE LIKE '%${title}%'
AND B.CONTENT LIKE '%${content}%'
AND( b.title like '%${all}%' OR b.content like '%${all}%' OR m1.id like '%${all}%' OR r.content like '%${all}%' OR m2.id like '%${all}%' )
ORDER BY B.BNO DESC LIMIT ${limit} OFFSET ${offset}

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT B.BNO) FROM COMMBOARD B LEFT OUTER JOIN MEMBER M1 ON B.MNO = M1.MNO LEFT OUTER JOIN COMMREPLY R ON R.BNO = B.BNO LEFT OUTER JOIN MEMBER M2 ON R.MNO = M2.MNO WHERE B.STATUS = 'Y' AND B.TYPE = 'HONEY'
AND M1.ID LIKE '%${writer}%'
AND B.TITLE LIKE '%${title}%'

AND( b.title like '%${all}%' OR b.content like '%${all}%' OR m1.id like '%${all}%' OR r.content like '%${all}%' OR m2.id like '%${all}%' )

SELECT B.BNO, B.TITLE, M.ID, M.NAME, B.READCOUNT, B.TYPE, B.ORIGINAL_FILENAME, B.RENAMED_FILENAME, B.CONTENT, B.CREATE_DATE, B.MODIFY_DATE, R.RNO AS R_RNO, R.BNO AS R_BNO, R.CONTENT AS R_CONTENT, M2.ID AS R_ID, R.CREATE_DATE AS R_CREATE_DATE, R.MODIFY_DATE AS R_MODIFY_DATE FROM COMMBOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON(B.MNO = M.MNO) LEFT OUTER JOIN COMMREPLY R ON (B.BNO = R.BNO) LEFT OUTER JOIN MEMBER M2 ON (R.MNO = M2.MNO) WHERE B.STATUS = 'Y' AND B.BNO = #{bNo}
